scripts.mongo:reset: docker stop mongo-db && docker rm mongo-db && yarn mongo:start
scripts.docker:build: cd backend && docker build -t backend_base:latest ./ && cd .. && docker-compose build
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose down && docker rmi backend_base quizmaster_server quizmaster_auth quizmaster_website
scripts.test: yarn docker:stop && docker-compose rm -fv mongodb && yarn docker:start
